intro:
To upload a new dataset, type a new name and click add. Supported uploads:

1) Cell Ranger: (Hs/Mm)
- .h5 or
- matrix.mtx, genes.tsv, and barcodes.tsv

2) 10X 3': (Hs only)
- fastq.gz files

You can also select previously uploaded files.

Selection required for tour.
Click to show inputs for transferring labels from another dataset to the selected dataset and for changing cluster resolution.

Click once:
Shows inputs to create a new dataset by subseting the currently selected dataset.

For removing low quality cells or for subclustering.

Click twice:
Shows inputs to create a new dataset by integrating multiple samples

For cluster-specific pseudobulk differential expression analysis, pathway analysis, and drug queries for a set of test samples in comparison to a set of control samples.
TSNE plot of clusters and associated labels.

Select a cluster to sort genes by.</br> Select nothing to show QC features first.</br></br>A selected cluster is compared to each other cluster and then a meta-analysis is performed for each gene to order marker genes.
Click here to rename the selected cluster.
Click here to sort genes by comparing the selected cluster to one other cluster.</br></br> This is usefull for distinguishing closely related clusters.

Select a gene or QC feature to plot for this intro.

Selection required for tour.
TSNE plot for the selected feature.
Violin plot shows distribution of selected feature in each cluster.

Click to plot complex metrics. For example:

FTL*(cluster==1) shows FTL expression in cluster 1.

FTL*is_ctrl or FTL*is_test shows FTL expression in control or test samples for integrated datasets.

doublet_score>3|mito_percent>15 shows cells that meet this criteria.

Saved boolean custom metrics can be used for subsetting a dataset for QC or subclustering.
